about.title: Front End Engineer with 1+ years of experience in Vue/React ecosystems, specializing in Nuxt.js and Next.js frameworks.
about.description: Proficient in Magento development, REST API integration, and object-oriented programming. Daily experience with design tools including Figma, Adobe XD, and Photoshop for UI/UX implementation. Linux enthusiast with strong technical foundation in modern web development.
about.current_job: Currently working as Front-End Developer at PT. Summit Global Teknologi.
about.job_details: Developing seasonal gaming event platforms (PMGC, PMSL, HOK Invitational), XClub community websites, and business intelligence dashboards using Next.js and ANTDesign.
experience.title: Experience that shapes modern web solutions
experience.description: With dedication to continuous learning and hands-on experience in modern web development, I specialize in creating responsive, user-centric applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks in the Vue.js and React ecosystems.
